connect20/pplsay_social_discussions.name: connect20/PPLSAY_Social_Discussions

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/pplsay_social_discussions.description:
Bring to online retailers and their customers discussions from social networks about products offered online
PPLSAY – what people say about products in social networks
SaaS solution for online retail businesses of any size
